<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/db3a205147ce2c335d5c2181c1f789277f8775b0|patch 8.1.2304: cannot get the mouse position when getting a mouse click>
patch 8.1.2304: cannot get the mouse position when getting a mouse click

Problem:    Cannot get the mouse position when getting a mouse click.
Solution:   Add getmousepos().

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.1.2304: cannot get the mouse position when getting a mouse click · vim/vim@db3a205
attachments.title: patch 8.1.2304: cannot get the mouse position when getting a mouse click · vim/vim@db3a205
attachments.text: Problem: Cannot get the mouse position when getting a mouse click. Solution: Add getmousepos().

text:

patch 8.1.2305: no warning for wrong entry in translations

Problem:    No warning for wrong entry in translations.
Solution:   Check semicolons in keywords entry of desktop file.

attachments.title: patch 8.1.2305: no warning for wrong entry in translations · vim/vim@e53ec39

patch 8.1.2306: double and triple clicks are not tested

Problem:    Double and triple clicks are not tested.
Solution:   Test mouse clicks to select text. (closes #5226)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/ecafcc15ca92ecb9c6b41dbb3b0fcdf89c9eff69|patch 8.1.2308: deleting text before zero-width textprop removes it>
patch 8.1.2308: deleting text before zero-width textprop removes it

Problem:    Deleting text before zero-width textprop removes it.
Solution:   Keep zero-width textprop when deleting text.

attachments.title: patch 8.1.2308: deleting text before zero-width textprop removes it · vim/vim@ecafcc1
attachments.text: Problem: Deleting text before zero-width textprop removes it. Solution: Keep zero-width textprop when deleting text.

patch 8.1.2309: compiler warning for argument type

Problem:    Compiler warning for argument type.
Solution:   Use linenr_T and cast to varnumber_T. (John Marriott)

attachments.title: patch 8.1.2309: compiler warning for argument type · vim/vim@abe12a1

patch 8.1.2310: no proper test for directory changes in quickfix

Problem:    No proper test for directory changes in quickfix.
Solution:   Add a test that uses multiple directories. (Yegappan Lakshmanan,
            closes #5230)
